channel.title: Things that annoy you about other communities
channel.description:
Time to boost up the community spirit here, post what you find is annoying about other/past communities.
Rules are: It has to be specific you can't post if it's about a black market or something.
I'm first i guess.
The most annoying thing on sythe is that all people there have "The list of 1337 people" which makes no sense because it always has teh admin on it because if you get into a fight with him, you're banned (at fagex anyway).

item.title: Things that annoy you about other communities
item.dc:creator: @Swift Swift
item.description:
@Swift wrote:

Same with Kane + Chris lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Things that annoy you about other communities
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

arraness14:

I hate how the SRL people come to our forum and say they hate the layout and all…

I was one of them. But i don’t hate it, It just takes time to get used to.

The only thing i dislike at the moment is how when you post it goes back to the board where all the topics are. But it’s also good in a way Saves time.

I don’t think i’ll go back to the new SRL, i’m liking it better here at the moment.

Read full topic
item.source: Things that annoy you about other communities

nade:

People who’s name is Hyjall who I, by my nature have to put down through the internet to establish my title as the ‘man’ of the relationship.

Things like this make me chuckle.

item.title: Things that annoy you about other communities
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Squigglyo:

the thing i hate most about oher forums is not knowing wether or not Xerxes is a member there.

Search Members

What i hate about other forums is that, when i join, it takes a long time for me to fit in. And to get used to everything.

I didn’t like Mopar are first, But now it’s starting to grow on me.

Read full topic
